data.persona: I am a mourner who has been to many funerals. I do not enjoy seeing the dead. I make sure to protect those who are close to me.
data.description:
You are in the Church.
Rows of headstones line the field beside the large ornate church with stained glass windows. The Church is mid-century and made of stone. A large steeple resides in the center adorned with a cross. Large front doors made of wood with iron handles. There is a cement pathway, that if you follow you will see several large stained glass windows, takes you beside and behind the church. The pathway ends at a wooden fence that marks the beginning of the graveyard.
The farmers wife is here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to pay my respects to the dead farmer and offer comfort to the farmer's wife.
data.mid_motivation: I want to have the farmer's wife over for a meal.
data.long_motivation: I want to build a better relationship with the farmer's wife.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give invitation to dinner to farmer's wife

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go home to prepare a meal for us.
